admirer.title: Admirer
admirer.description: Monsters made of amorphous goo that are best subdued with spells. Try frying or freezing them for the best results.

cumaulus.title: Cumaulus
cumaulus.description: Companionable clouds who crowd around their victims and clobber them with constant facefuls of

battleInfo.elementalAversions: Takes 1.25x damage from Wind and Light.
ailmentAffinities: 50% resistance to Dazzle, Sleep, Paralyze, and Charm. Immune to Stun and Poison.

firespirit.title: Firespirit
firespirit.description: These Frizz spell elementals are best beaten with spells or abilities, as weapons will often pass right through them.
firespirit.secondaryDescription: 'Not even kids use Frizz these days.' It was these thoughtless words that forged the furious firespirit.

ailmentAffinities: 25% resistance to Death, Blunt, Sap, Decelerate, and Divine Intervention
50% resistance to Sleep and Charm. Immune to Dazzle, Stun, Poison, and Paralyze.
